page.title: 20INDUSTRIAL DEVEL. ERDINGTON
page.content: In this largely residential area industry is concentrated into two industrial estates. 1. Birch Rd East trading estate. This site belonged to GKN and was purchased by sapcot who sold off individual units which now house a diverse range of industrial activities.(from making bicycle wheels to printing.) In addition some purpose built units have grown up alongside. 2. Holford industrial estate. sold off by a large company (IMI). On the cleared site high quality units are being built in an attractive landscaped environment alongside the river Tame. Both developments have resulted from the decline in capacity of traditional industry which has resulted in large scale unemployment. A government grant is helping to remedy the situation.
